hints.content:
To find the difference, we start with the height of $\purpleD{\text{Plant }2}$ and subtract the height of $\blueE{\text{Plant } 1}$.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7887e707942f1a1fd9f019931ee1e49cbb2f1de4)

$\purpleD{35}\text{ cm}-\blueE{22}\text{ cm} = \maroonD{\Box}\text{ cm}$

Let's subtract to find the difference.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5a00522edf463b53f982e7d3561025c615d482a7)

$\purpleD{35}\text{ cm}  - \blueE{22}\text{ cm}  = \maroonD{13}\text{ cm}$
Plant $2$ is $\maroonD{13}\text { cm}$ longer than Plant $1$.

question.content:
Lui measures the height of each of his bean plants.  

Bean plant | Height  
- | - | -
Plant $1$ | $22 \text { cm}$ 
Plant $2$ | $35 \text { cm}$ 
Plant $3$|  $14 \text { cm}$ 

**How much longer is Plant $2$ than Plant $1$?** 

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] $\text{cm}$
